roleset.name: cast an image back, reflect
roleset.note: MIRROR-V NOTES: This roleset id="mirror.02" makes sense for reflect, but less so for mirror. Hmmm. (from mirror.01-v)

role.descr: surface casting the reflection, image being reflected

example.name: arg2 subject
example.text: Analysts said the company's troubles mirror those of the industry.
